item.title: Why You Should Own A Feature Phone
item.description: With the advent of smartphones, the decline of the once cherished feature phones was inevitable. Still, companies are manufacturing new feature phones, and people are going back to them for their convenience and minimalistic approach. I have seen many of my friends using one as a secondary phone besides their smartphone, and I also have one. Then again, why should you rethink these feature phones? Because they are cheap. Well, it is not the sole reason, but for many, including myself, it might be the main selling point.

item.title: Avalanche
item.description: Pouring the hot coffee in my mug, I settled myself into the chair outside my cottage. From there I could see the rocky mountains rising themselves as high as they could. The crispy wind drifted through the narrow valleys, carrying the sweet smell that genially spoke of spring. It was another lovely afternoon in the country sides. The steam rising from the mug blurred my vision as I gazed at the mountains.

item.title: Fallacies Concerning Creativity
item.description: Imagine yourself at an art gallery. You are looking through the beautiful paintings; done by incredible artists. Looking at those paintings, you are wondering “Wow! I wish I could be as creative as they are!” Then a sigh follows, reflecting your despair. A majority of people think of creativity as a divine power a selected few inherently occupies. They can create whatever they want with their God-given talents. They can paint a beautiful picture, build a unique company having a unique concept behind it.
